ch.bfh.ti.ostes2.gossip

Class Frontend

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.ti.ostes2.gossip.Frontend

  • public class Frontend
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Frontend in the gossip architecture. It is intended to forward updates and queries from clients (computers, tablets and so on) to a available ReplicationManager. As this is only a simulation, the Frontend picks randomly a available ReplicationManager, posts randomly messages and sends randomly queries. The updating and deleting of messages is not yet implemented. For each communication category (updating and querying) the tags from Utils are used to distinct them.
    Author:
    sosterwalder

        Parameters:

      • query

        public void query()
        Sends a query-request to an available ReplicationManager. The query tells the Frontend the current time stamps of all available replication managers known to the queried replication manager.

      • listenToUpdateAnswers
